html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-10062018-07-18,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActSalaries Act
SubjectOrder designating the Department of (1) Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development; (2) Canadian Heritage; and (3) Industry to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie
PrecisOrder Designating (1) the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of the responsibilities of that Minister which are related to La Francophonie; (2) the Department of Canadian Heritage to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of the responsibilities of that Minister which are related to official languages; and (3) the Department of Industry to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of all of the other responsibilities of that Minister.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0063 Publication Date: 2018-08-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order designating the Department of (1) Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development; (2) Canadian Heritage; and (3) Industry to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie
precis: Order Designating (1) the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of the responsibilities of that Minister which are related to La Francophonie; (2) the Department of Canadian Heritage to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of the responsibilities of that Minister which are related to official languages; and (3) the Department of Industry to provide support to the Minister of La Francophonie in the carrying out of all of the other responsibilities of that Minister.
